data.eml:eml: Mixturopoda Baker and Monson, a new genus of the uropodine family Metagynuridae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from the British Isles

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baker, Anne S., Monson, Frank D. (2007): Mixturopoda Baker and Monson, a new genus of the uropodine family Metagynuridae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from the British Isles. Zootaxa 1665: 1-17, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180061
